# Issue 18715: Move fixed part of build/Makefile to build/deps

archive/issues_018478.json:
```json
{
    "body": "The build rules (not the actual files) for the scripts and extcode targets are \"auto-generated\" but they are really just one fixed block. Move this to `build/deps` instead.\n\n**Branch/Commit:** [fa53538bff4dd81efd8635ebafae9b95146ac5e5](https://github.com/sagemath/sagetrac-mirror/commit/fa53538bff4dd81efd8635ebafae9b95146ac5e5)\n\n**Reviewer:** Nathann Cohen\n\n**Author:** Jeroen Demeyer\n\n**Dependencies:** #18533\n\nIssue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/18715\n\n",
    "closed_at": "2015-06-18T17:57:57Z",
    "created_at": "2015-06-16T18:27:21Z",
    "labels": [
        "component: build",
        "enhancement"
    ],
    "milestone": "https://github.com/sagemath/sagetest/milestones/sage-6.8",
    "title": "Move fixed part of build/Makefile to build/deps",
    "type": "issue",
    "url": "https://github.com/sagemath/sagetest/issues/18715",
    "user": "https://github.com/jdemeyer"
}
```
The build rules (not the actual files) for the scripts and extcode targets are "auto-generated" but they are really just one fixed block. Move this to `build/deps` instead.

**Branch/Commit:** [fa53538bff4dd81efd8635ebafae9b95146ac5e5](https://github.com/sagemath/sagetrac-mirror/commit/fa53538bff4dd81efd8635ebafae9b95146ac5e5)

**Reviewer:** Nathann Cohen

**Author:** Jeroen Demeyer

**Dependencies:** #18533

Issue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/18715
